TopicTitle: [1.2] UAL002's Lorefriendy Serious Parody Flags v2.1 [Fall of the Ape Edition]

Articles.Content: I love it. Ill add that and make Ishmael and Polan tonight.

No haggling, one low price get em' while they're hot!

v1.3 Added 2 new flags, Ishmael and Polan. Added a bio for Republico Brasilo

Download: Dropbox v1.3

Edited August 21, 2014 by UAL002

New version. I wanted to call it the REOM version which stands for "Ruthless Efficiency of Moderators" but I didn't have enough room. Cheers. And thanks for notifying me.

v1.35 Added License and readme

I got bored this morning and did a few simple ones and wanted to share.

A Chinese dragon, a cleaner Brazil and 2 version of a UK flag.

zip file
Wow. I'll gladly accept all of them. It'll be almost 2 weeks before an update. Holiday in europe.

I'd love a Irish flag in Kerbal Version. because I am Irish. no other reason, really.

Edited September 9, 2014 by One-Way Films

Alright, as an irishman/lady, what symbolizes your people best? I'm in a very somber mood as I just walked the Berlin wall. I don't feel like being cheeky and putting a pint of guiness on the flag is fair. And you'll have to wait a bit.

Wow. I'll gladly accept all of them. It'll be almost 2 weeks before an update. Holiday in europe.

well I have a lot of experience making crazy flags

If you'd like to partner up that would be awesme. I do want to acknowledge those other's work as well though. So for instance the brasilo flag, I'd like to have the original poster's blessing before changing it. If that makes any sense?
You should contact Scott Manley and try to persuede him to use your Skotslund flag

I know right? His country might get their independence soon. I love the UK but there is a special place in my heart for Scotland. I don't know how to feel about it.

Edited September 10, 2014 by UAL002

Yay!

Any chance of some Kaustralian themed jobbies?

Blue Ensign:

Eureka Flag:

Australian Aboriginal:

Torres Strait Islander:

Sam Neill Flag:
I'd adore a few colour variation / negative / high contrast / dayglo / psychedelic versions of the Kerbodyne flag, too, if any of you arty types are feeling bored and generous.
I'll see what I can do for you but as I said. It'll be a bit before I'm back home.

If you'd like to partner up that would be awesme. I do want to acknowledge those other's work as well though. So for instance the brasilo flag, I'd like to have the original poster's blessing before changing it. If that makes any sense?

Totally granted. Flag and bio are for the community and may be freely modified. =)
Many sincere thanks for this awesome add-on. Now I can spread the word (and wealth) of Kexas throughout the Kerbal System!

Totally granted. Flag and bio are for the community and may be freely modified. =)

Awesome. Thanks Badleo. Expect an update as early as Sunday or a few days later guys.

I've made a Krussland flag and a small bio:

"Central land of Kermania, Krussland was home of most Kerman royalty. How can they coexist and have different space programs? Who knows, it's Kerbin! Ruled by king Krederik The Spacest, who is believed (by his ministers) to have the most serious face on all Kerbin and craziest ideas."

If you can provide me a PNG of that yellow logo on the helmet with transparency I can clean it up a bit and add it. Sorry for the delay on the update guys. I was hoping 25 would drop when I got back and I could update this mod while everyone else updates theirs for 25.

If you can provide me a PNG of that yellow logo on the helmet with transparency I can clean it up a bit and add it. Sorry for the delay on the update guys. I was hoping 25 would drop when I got back and I could update this mod while everyone else updates theirs for 25.

Sorry, totally missed this one. I'll get to my PC in 24 hours, so tomorrow I will be able to send a .PSD.
Ya know here in Kanada Keh? we got rid of that pop singer? We lost him in an Olympic hockey match, teh heh
I swear to god. These need to be the stock countries.
I'm back gents. An update should be in the works tomorrow. Try and get me that png if you can Niemand303 otherwise it might not make the update.

I'm back gents. An update should be in the works tomorrow. Try and get me that png if you can Niemand303 otherwise it might not make the update.

Sorry for the delay. The logo is the capital letter K from this font. The flag without it is here.
Still at work, but I see you post. Just a few more hours.
